class.comment: Represents a wrapper around a UTF-8 String to be transferred through a Byte Buffer.

params.name: length
params.comment: The maximum string length to read.

return.comment: The string represented by the Byte Buffer.

read.comment: Reads a UTF-8 string from a byte buffer.

params.name: bytes
params.comment: The byte buffer to write to.

params.name: length
params.comment: The maximum string length to write.

write.comment: Writes a UTF-8 string to a byte buffer.
